name: Tableaoom
description:
Tableaoom is a first-person shooter, 3D, but with 2D elements similar to the famous Doom. You need to collect all 3 chairs of Rietveld, killing the greatest amount of enemies without dying!

How to Play:
Keyboard: W (Up), A (Left), S (Down), D (Right)

Objective:
Collect 3 Rietveld Red and Blue Chairs and win the game!

Credits:

  • Programmer: Renan Santana
  • Art: Matheus Poro
